conjure.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to perform clever tricks in which you seem to make things appear, disappear, or change by magic
conjure.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The magician conjured a rabbit out of his hat.
conjure.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make something appear or happen in a way which is not expected
conjure.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He has conjured victories from worse situations than this.
